name: mikroe.click.dac17
short_description: DAC 17 Click is a compact add-on board that establishes precise voltage output control in various electronic applications. This board features the DAC7558, a 12-bit, octal-channel voltage output digital-to-analog (DAC) from Texas Instruments. It offers flexible internal or external power options with a voltage range from 2.7V to 5.5V. It features a rapid settling time of 5Âµs, rail-to-rail output amplifiers, and the ability to simultaneously or sequentially update outputs, ensuring precise and efficient performance.
